title: Sociology of Education - Reconceptualizing College Knowledge: Class, Race, and Black Students in a College-Counseling Field
itunes:title: Sociology of Education - Reconceptualizing College Knowledge: Class, Race, and Black Students in a College-Counseling Field
description: Author Melanie Jones Gast discusses her article, "Reconceptualizing College Knowledge: Class, Race, and Black Students in a College-Counseling Field," published in the January 2022 issue of Sociology of Education.
content:encoded: Author Melanie Jones Gast discusses her article, "Reconceptualizing College Knowledge: Class, Race, and Black Students in a College-Counseling Field," published in the January 2022 issue of Sociology of Education.
